name: Kling-on Kirk
description: There is a cryptic secret hidden by the creators of this hunt and it is your job, intepid hunters, to hunt for them and decode what they mean! May the codes be with you.

questions.title: Kling-on Kirk
questions.description: There is a cryptic secret hidden by the creators of this hunt and it is your job, intepid hunters, to hunt for them and decode what they mean! May the codes be with you.
questions.answer: When cold revenge is served, the dish is always very good
